item.title: Versant Hires Paramount’s Erin Calhoun and MLB’s Steve Arocho as Communications Executives
item.description: Versant, the new company Comcast has spun off from NBCUniversal’s cable assets, has finished assembling its team of communications executives: Erin Calhoun has been named senior vice president o
